txt.en: 'Ghûrdhos carry seeds of unbalance. Once rocks fall from mountain, more rocks come with, until side of mountain gone. You understand, the forest is like mountain. Ghûrdhos lived with balance. They not be like rocks. Help us stop the falling rocks of Ghûrdhos hearts.'
Ghân-buri-Ghân, chieftain of the Drúedain, asks of you to defeat Wood-trolls that have been corrupting the forest.
'The mountain remains tall. You help the Drúedain protect this sacred ground. You are kind like waterfall.'
Ghûrdhos can be found throughout the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should defeat Ghûrdhos.
Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
